body_html: @Raj-08 The above technique with the scopes is referring to models that have variables with the same names, so you are using the scopes to avoid that. If your models do not have same variable names then it's easier to load them. Pay attention on where you place the savers and also the variables that you feed to them!

body: @Raj-08 The above technique with the scopes is referring to models that have variables with the same names, so you are using the scopes to avoid that. If your models do not have same variable names then it's easier to load them. Pay attention on where you place the savers and also the variables that you feed to them!
